  16. (* The run-time library for lexers generated by camllex *)

  18. ‌type position = {
  19.   pos_fname : string;
  20.   pos_lnum : int;
  21.   pos_bol : int;
  22.   pos_cnum : int;
  23. }

  25. ‌let dummy_pos = {
  26.   pos_fname = "";
  27.   pos_lnum = 0;
  28.   pos_bol = 0;
  29.   pos_cnum = -1;
  30. }

  32. ‌type lexbuf =
  33.   { refill_buff : lexbuf -> unit;
  34.     mutable lex_buffer : bytes;
  35.     mutable lex_buffer_len : int;
  36.     mutable lex_abs_pos : int;
  37.     mutable lex_start_pos : int;
  38.     mutable lex_curr_pos : int;
  39.     mutable lex_last_pos : int;
  40.     mutable lex_last_action : int;
  41.     mutable lex_eof_reached : bool;
  42.     mutable lex_mem : int array;
  43.     mutable lex_start_p : position;
  44.     mutable lex_curr_p : position;
  45.   }

  47. ‌type lex_tables =
  48.   { lex_base: string;
  49.     lex_backtrk: string;
  50.     lex_default: string;
  51.     lex_trans: string;
  52.     lex_check: string;
  53.     lex_base_code : string;
  54.     lex_backtrk_code : string;
  55.     lex_default_code : string;
  56.     lex_trans_code : string;
  57.     lex_check_code : string;
  58.     lex_code: string;}

  60. external c_engine : lex_tables -> int -> lexbuf -> int = "caml_lex_engine"
  61. external c_new_engine : lex_tables -> int -> lexbuf -> int
  62.                       = "caml_new_lex_engine"

  64. ‌let engine tbl state buf =
  65.   let result = c_engine tbl state buf in
  66.   if result >= 0 && buf.lex_curr_p != dummy_pos then begin
  67.     buf.lex_start_p <- buf.lex_curr_p;
  68.     buf.lex_curr_p <- {buf.lex_curr_p
  69.                        with pos_cnum = buf.lex_abs_pos + buf.lex_curr_pos};
  70.   end;
  71.   result


  74. ‌let new_engine tbl state buf =
  75.   let result = c_new_engine tbl state buf in
  76.   if result >= 0 && buf.lex_curr_p != dummy_pos then begin
  77.     buf.lex_start_p <- buf.lex_curr_p;
  78.     buf.lex_curr_p <- {buf.lex_curr_p
  79.                        with pos_cnum = buf.lex_abs_pos + buf.lex_curr_pos};
  80.   end;
  81.   result

  83. ‌let lex_refill read_fun aux_buffer lexbuf =
  84.   let read =
  85.     read_fun aux_buffer (Bytes.length aux_buffer) in
  86.   let n =
  87.     if read > 0
  88.     then read
  89.     else (lexbuf.lex_eof_reached <- true; 0) in
  90.   (* Current state of the buffer:
  91.         <-------|---------------------|----------->
  92.         |  junk |      valid data     |   junk    |
  93.         ^       ^                     ^           ^
  94.         0    start_pos             buffer_end    Bytes.length buffer
  95.   *)
  96.   if lexbuf.lex_buffer_len + n > Bytes.length lexbuf.lex_buffer then begin
  97.     (* There is not enough space at the end of the buffer *)
  98.     if lexbuf.lex_buffer_len - lexbuf.lex_start_pos + n
  99.        <= Bytes.length lexbuf.lex_buffer
  100.     then begin
  101.       (* But there is enough space if we reclaim the junk at the beginning
  102.          of the buffer *)
  103.       Bytes.blit lexbuf.lex_buffer lexbuf.lex_start_pos
  104.                   lexbuf.lex_buffer 0
  105.                   (lexbuf.lex_buffer_len - lexbuf.lex_start_pos)
  106.     end else begin
  107.       (* We must grow the buffer.  Doubling its size will provide enough
  108.          space since n <= String.length aux_buffer <= String.length buffer.
  109.          Watch out for string length overflow, though. *)
  110. ‌      let newlen =
  111.         Int.min (2 * Bytes.length lexbuf.lex_buffer) Sys.max_string_length in
  112.       if lexbuf.lex_buffer_len - lexbuf.lex_start_pos + n > newlen
  113.       then failwith "Lexing.lex_refill: cannot grow buffer";
  114. ‌      let newbuf = Bytes.create newlen in
  115.       (* Copy the valid data to the beginning of the new buffer *)
  116.       Bytes.blit lexbuf.lex_buffer lexbuf.lex_start_pos
  117.                   newbuf 0
  118.                   (lexbuf.lex_buffer_len - lexbuf.lex_start_pos);
  119.       lexbuf.lex_buffer <- newbuf
  120.     end;
  121.     (* Reallocation or not, we have shifted the data left by
  122.        start_pos characters; update the positions *)
  123. ‌    let s = lexbuf.lex_start_pos in
  124.     lexbuf.lex_abs_pos <- lexbuf.lex_abs_pos + s;
  125.     lexbuf.lex_curr_pos <- lexbuf.lex_curr_pos - s;
  126.     lexbuf.lex_start_pos <- 0;
  127.     lexbuf.lex_last_pos <- lexbuf.lex_last_pos - s;
  128.     lexbuf.lex_buffer_len <- lexbuf.lex_buffer_len - s ;
  129. ‌    let t = lexbuf.lex_mem in
  130.     for i = 0 to Array.length t-1 do
  131. ‌      let v = t.(i) in
  132.       if v >= 0 then
  133.         t.(i) <- v-s
  134.     done
  135.   end;
  136.   (* There is now enough space at the end of the buffer *)
  137.   Bytes.blit aux_buffer 0 lexbuf.lex_buffer lexbuf.lex_buffer_len n;
  138.   lexbuf.lex_buffer_len <- lexbuf.lex_buffer_len + n

  140. ‌let zero_pos = {
  141.   pos_fname = "";
  142.   pos_lnum = 1;
  143.   pos_bol = 0;
  144.   pos_cnum = 0;
  145. }

  147. ‌let from_function ?(with_positions = true) f =
  148.   { refill_buff = lex_refill f (Bytes.create 512);
  149.     lex_buffer = Bytes.create 1024;
  150.     lex_buffer_len = 0;
  151.     lex_abs_pos = 0;
  152.     lex_start_pos = 0;
  153.     lex_curr_pos = 0;
  154.     lex_last_pos = 0;
  155.     lex_last_action = 0;
  156.     lex_mem = [||];
  157.     lex_eof_reached = false;
  158.     lex_start_p = if with_positions then zero_pos else dummy_pos;
  159.     lex_curr_p = if with_positions then zero_pos else dummy_pos;
  160.   }

  162. ‌let from_channel ?with_positions ic =
  163.   from_function ?with_positions (fun buf n -> input ic buf 0 n)

  165. let from_string ?(with_positions = true) s =
  166.   { refill_buff = (fun lexbuf -> lexbuf.lex_eof_reached <- true);
  167.     lex_buffer = Bytes.of_string s; (* have to make a copy for compatibility
  168.                                        with unsafe-string mode *)
  169.     lex_buffer_len = String.length s;
  170.     lex_abs_pos = 0;
  171.     lex_start_pos = 0;
  172.     lex_curr_pos = 0;
  173.     lex_last_pos = 0;
  174.     lex_last_action = 0;
  175.     lex_mem = [||];
  176.     lex_eof_reached = true;
  177.     lex_start_p = if with_positions then zero_pos else dummy_pos;
  178.     lex_curr_p = if with_positions then zero_pos else dummy_pos;
  179.   }

  181. let set_position lexbuf position =
  182.   lexbuf.lex_curr_p  <- {position with pos_fname = lexbuf.lex_curr_p.pos_fname};
  183.   lexbuf.lex_abs_pos <- position.pos_cnum

  185. let set_filename lexbuf fname =
  186.   lexbuf.lex_curr_p <- {lexbuf.lex_curr_p with pos_fname = fname}

  188. let with_positions lexbuf = lexbuf.lex_curr_p != dummy_pos

  190. let lexeme lexbuf =
  191.   let len = lexbuf.lex_curr_pos - lexbuf.lex_start_pos in
  192.   Bytes.sub_string lexbuf.lex_buffer lexbuf.lex_start_pos len

  194. ‌let sub_lexeme lexbuf i1 i2 =
  195.   let len = i2-i1 in
  196.   Bytes.sub_string lexbuf.lex_buffer i1 len

  198. ‌let sub_lexeme_opt lexbuf i1 i2 =
  199.   if i1 >= 0 then begin
  200.     let len = i2-i1 in
  201.     Some (Bytes.sub_string lexbuf.lex_buffer i1 len)
  202.   end else begin
  203.     None
  204.   end

  206. let sub_lexeme_char lexbuf i = Bytes.get lexbuf.lex_buffer i

  208. ‌let sub_lexeme_char_opt lexbuf i =
  209.   if i >= 0 then
  210.     Some (Bytes.get lexbuf.lex_buffer i)
  211.   else
  212.     None


  215. ‌let lexeme_char lexbuf i =
  216.   Bytes.get lexbuf.lex_buffer (lexbuf.lex_start_pos + i)

  218. ‌let lexeme_start lexbuf = lexbuf.lex_start_p.pos_cnum
  219. ‌let lexeme_end lexbuf = lexbuf.lex_curr_p.pos_cnum

  221. ‌let lexeme_start_p lexbuf = lexbuf.lex_start_p
  222. ‌let lexeme_end_p lexbuf = lexbuf.lex_curr_p

  224. ‌let new_line lexbuf =
  225.   let lcp = lexbuf.lex_curr_p in
  226.   if lcp != dummy_pos then
  227.     lexbuf.lex_curr_p <-
  228.       { lcp with
  229.         pos_lnum = lcp.pos_lnum + 1;
  230.         pos_bol = lcp.pos_cnum;
  231.       }



  235. (* Discard data left in lexer buffer. *)

  237. ‌let flush_input lb =
  238.   lb.lex_curr_pos <- 0;
  239.   lb.lex_abs_pos <- 0;
  240.   let lcp = lb.lex_curr_p in
  241.   if lcp != dummy_pos then
  242.     lb.lex_curr_p <- {zero_pos with pos_fname = lcp.pos_fname};
  243.   lb.lex_buffer_len <- 0;
